attributes.action: Cut benefits for people who don’t want to work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is the Tax payer paying for lazy people benefits that choose not to work?

I am 27 of age and I started my own business 3 years ago, I be better off on benefits, but I am not lazy.

I dont take a good wage but u know I worked for it.

A lot of people use the benefits system rather the looking for a JOB.    It is due to the government that the country is the way  it is.
 
I say Stop the benefits for people who do not want to work, which means a tax cut for working people. 

Any one that is ill can get benefits after 3 doctors has check the out first.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
